text: Giuliana Rancic (; n√©e DePandi; born August 17, 1974) is an Italian-American entertainment reporter, businesswoman, and television personality. She is a co-anchor of E! News. In Chicago and Washington, D.C., Rancic and her husband Bill Rancic own a resturant chain titled: RPM Steak, RPM Italian and RPM on the Water. Rancic is a breast cancer survivor. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Television personalities from Chicago Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:People from Naples Category:Italian businesspeople Category:Businesspeople from Chicago Category:American bloggers Category:Philanthropists from Chicago
title: Giuliana Rancic
